Asked about former Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell 's infamous 2003 speech to the United Nations in which he cited questionable intelligence about Iraq's alleged weapons program, Donald Rumsfeld said Colin Powell was an "honorable man" who believed every word he gave in that speech. Donald Rumsfeld also defended the detention camp at Guantanamo Bay, which the Obama administration has been unsuccessfully trying to shutter for the past two years.
